SEARCH
Package src2.controller

Class UserManager

Object
UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
Manages user-related operations such as validating users and resetting passwords. Provides methods to validate a user's credentials and reset a user's password.
Since:
2024-10-27
Version:
2.4
Author:
Chin Linn Sheng

  • Constructor Details

      public UserManager()

  • Method Details

    • validateUser

      public static boolean validateUser(String id, String password)
      Validates a user's credentials by checking their user ID and password. The password is encoded before comparison.
      Parameters:
      id - the user ID to validate
      password - the password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the user ID exists and the password is correct, false otherwise

    • resetPassword

      public static void resetPassword(String newPassword)
      Resets the password for the current user. The new password is encoded before being saved.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - the new password to set for the current user
